channel.title: Hmm noob? ban?
channel.description:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg854/scaled.php?server=854&filename=noobns.png&res=medium[/img] what it say's:
hey i see that you need help with your server bub, and id be glad to help you, but i know this is stupid but its kinda a waste of my time, and ill do it for the cost of rsgp or rs mem for 1 month, just a simple $7. I could help you code more if you want too. But just reply to this if you want some help.

item.title: Hmm noob? ban?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Please click the report to administrator button like Si Force said, just to make sure it isn’t falsified evidence.

If they are selling via private message that is an instant mute.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm noob? ban?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you have a problem with a PM, then PM a moderator about it or click the ‘Report to admin’ button on the offensive PM. Don’t make a topic about it, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm noob? ban?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:9, topic:437094”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=539807.msg3952082#msg3952082 date=1332372180]

Not the first time this has been done (Both the topic & offence) just ignore these, or just tell them in the post its not aloud.

welcome back noob
[/quote][/quote]
nou

solocktime?

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm noob? ban?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:11, topic:437094”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=539807.msg3952300#msg3952300 date=1332383506]
rep-- doesn’t seem to work, we may need to test this once again…
[/quote]
Huh… Same here. Needs more people to confirm it actually works,
It only worked once for me.[/quote]
I concur, after many seconds of research I have found that it only worked once, I must get to the bottom of this issue when it is next available to be tested.

Read full topic
